entry.title: $2000 // Great Space 2Br High Ceilings Balcony Steps 2 Express Sub & Markets
entry.content:
A fantastic opportunity of an apartment situated in the heart of the latest trendy neighborhood known as Greenwood Heights. Short walk to all the shops that are creating the bustle of Industry City such as Saks 5th Ave, Bed Bath and Beyond, Costco and host to many weekly events. Less than a minute walk to the express subway at 36th Street (N,D and R trains) which will have you in lower NYC in approx. 15 minutes. Great location with so much to explore around. The apartment features:

* Hardwood Floors
* High Ceilings
* Spacious Living Room
* Full Bathroom with Tub
* Large Bedroom
* Huge E.I.K. with Plenty of Cabinets
* Separate 2nd Bedroom
* Huge Walk-In Closet
* Additional Smaller Room- Good For Office
* Nice Size Balcony
* Heat & Hot Water Included

To set up a viewing, contact Leo at (646)296-3427
Good credit and proof of income req'd. Roommates welcomed.
